Changelog
#########


v0.3.1 - *2018-02-24*
---------------------

- Add sphinx-docs, https://empyscripts.readthedocs.io


v0.3.0 - *2018-01-25*
---------------------

- New utility ``printinfo``.


v0.2.0 - *2018-01-09*
---------------------

- New add-on ``fdesign``.
- Now has tests and TravisCI, coveralls integration.


v0.1.1 - *2017-09-22*
---------------------

- Initial release; add-on ``tmtemod``.
